channel.title: Summoning
channel.description: Not RS's summoning but summoning in a way, virtually the same thing. I've made it so the summoned monster follows behind me and attacks anything i attack, going to make a command to turn attacking on and off. I've also fixed all the glitches i could find, the monster dying (if it's a cat the cat returns to my inv) when i log, it dies and creates a new monster behind me if it's more than 15 spaces away and a few other glitches i forgot. [img]http://s430.photobucket.com/albums/qq22/Maxammus/PetPvP.png[/img] No video =[. I'm using dev v7 so pretty much none of this was coded ;P.

item.title: Summoning
item.dc:creator: @Maxammus Maxammus
item.description:
@Maxammus wrote:

Not RS’s summoning but summoning in a way, virtually the same thing.
I’ve made it so the summoned monster follows behind me and attacks anything i attack, going to make a command to turn attacking on and off.
I’ve also fixed all the glitches i could find, the monster dying (if it’s a cat the cat returns to my inv) when i log, it dies and creates a new monster behind me if it’s more than 15 spaces away and a few other glitches i forgot.

No video =[.
I’m using dev v7 so pretty much none of this was coded ;P.
